question.instructiontext: Select the correct options, and click the Submit button.
question.questiontext: Before Maj Marks conducts the briefing to the Commander, what are some important things that your team should consider regarding the presentation of your findings and risk communication?

options.option: Ensure data is translated into understandable information for Commanders
Describe the situation in a positive way; omit or gloss over negative information
Use only statistics to explain risk
Anticipate the issues and questions the chain of command may have
